plot: Three teenagers encounter a ghost who is in limbo until he retrieves his lost head. They do their bit to help him find it.
title: The Headless Ghost
plot_es: Three teenagers encounter a ghost who is in limbo until he retrieves his lost head. They do their bit to help him find it.
plot_en: Three teenagers encounter a ghost who is in limbo until he retrieves his lost head. They do their bit to help him find it.

cast.role: The Ghost of the Fourth Earl of Ambrose
cast.name: Clive Revill
